```{r}
  set.seed(123)
  
  mu = c(5,10)
  # retrieve galaxy data
  y = rnorm(100, mu)
  y = y[y>=0]
  # estimation
  bayesmix = bayes_estimation(data = round(y),
                              K = 2, #not many to run the example rapidly
                              dist = "shifted_poisson",
                              nb_iter = 500, #not many to run the example rapidly
                              burnin = 100)
  
# mode estimation
bayesmode = bayes_mode(bayesmix, tol_mixp = 0.99)
  
plot(bayesmix)
```
